name: Nanping Days
description:
Play as Chu Wanning as Mo Ran brings him out on a date in this fanmade, post-canon game for Meatbun's "Dumb Husky and White Cat Shizun" novel! Multiple endings, beautiful illustrations await!

Brought to you by: @bearlylele @whitecatshizun @yu_karuru @kkmy31 (on Twitter!)
